import { useEffect, useState } from "react" import { fetchStudents } from "../services/studentServices" export const Students = () => { const [students, setStudents] = useState([]) const handleFetchCalls = () => { fetchStudents().then((data) => { setStudents(data) }) } useEffect(() => { handleFetchCalls() }, []) return ( <>
